metadata.title: CVE-2023-52507 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: nfc:nci: assert requested protocol is valid The protocol is used in a bit maskto determine if the protocol is supported. Assert the provided protocol isless than the maximum defined so it doesn't potentially perform ashift-out-of-bounds and provide a clearer error for undefined protocols vsunsupported ones.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
